title: Crude growth rate equals cbr minus cdr

content.question: The crude growth rate, r , of a population is calculated by

choices.label: multiplying the existing population size by life expectancy
dividing the crude birth rate by 2
adding the crude birth rate to the crude death rate
subtracting the crude death rate from the crude birth rate

content.answer: subtracting the crude death rate from the crude birth rate

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe environmental concepts and processes.
